channel.title: Live mode grayed out
channel.description: Hi, I tried to install axoloti in my arch linux, though it was saying dist not supported I applied dirty hack to get it compile skipping the firmware installation part, i installed the chibios 19.1.2 instead of 2.6.9 , now though the GUI boots up and i can load patches it says please compile firmware in firmware ID and the live check box is grayed out. There is no sound or graphs being displayed of the demo tutorial patch.

item.title: Live mode grayed out
item.dc:creator: @macjackingjack
item.description:
@macjackingjack wrote:

Hi,
I tried to install axoloti in my arch linux, though it was saying dist not supported I applied dirty hack to get it compile skipping the firmware installation part, i installed the chibios 19.1.2 instead of 2.6.9 , now though the GUI boots up and i can load patches it says please compile firmware in firmware ID and the live check box is grayed out. There is no sound or graphs being displayed of the demo tutorial patch.

Read full topic
